Block.Dons.Website: You are on the website of the community in the %countryname%. If you are not resident in the UK for tax or administrative purposes, we may offer you fiscal advantages on the donation page of your country by clicking here.

Block.Inscription.Formulaire: In order to continue your application, we ask you to fill in the document to be downloaded here
Merci de nous retourner ce document, soi: Thank you for returning this document, either by mail (%mail_inscription%), or by the Post Office (%adresse_postale_inscription%).

Groupe_Jeunes_Nombre: For a group of young people (number envisaged)
Objet_Demande: Specify, in a few words, the purpose of your application
Block.Inscription.Formulaire.Fin: In order to continue your request, we ask you to complete the following document and send it (preferably by return mail) to the secretariat indicated in the mail that will be sent to you.
